summary: A bilingual (Hindi and English) poetry website showcasing poets from all 29 Indian states and 8 union territories. Features an interactive India map on the homepage where users can click states/UTs to view poet profiles with their ghazals, kavitas, shers, nazms, kahanis, image shayaris, videos, audio, and top 5 shayaris. Website owner's poetry is featured separately.
architectural_notes: Website requires bilingual content management system for Hindi and English
Interactive SVG or canvas-based India map with state/UT boundaries
Media storage and delivery for images, videos, and audio files
Database schema to organize poets by state/union territory
Responsive design to handle map interaction on mobile devices
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Colored political map of India showing all 29 states and 8 union territories with distinct warm colors for each region, state boundaries clearly marked, without labels or text overlays, optimized for use as a background layer (india-map-background.dim_1200x800.png)

existing_features.title: Create an interactive India map on the homepage displaying all 29 states and 8 union territories with distinct colors for each region, where each state and union territory is clickable
Implement bilingual support for Hindi and English languages throughout the website interface

Create poet profile pages that display after clicking a state/union territory, showing the poet's biography, ghazals, kavitas, shers, nazms, kahanis, image shayaris, videos, audio, and top 5 shayaris in both Hindi and English
Create a separate dedicated section for the website owner's poetry that is accessible from the main navigation

Design a visually appealing, culturally appropriate interface with a warm, artistic theme featuring traditional Indian color palettes, elegant typography suitable for poetry display, and clean layouts that highlight literary content

Modify the IndiaMap component to use a more diverse color palette with distinct, easily distinguishable colors for each state and union territory, ensuring high visual contrast between adjacent regions

Adjust the positioning and layout of the IndiaMap component state/UT cards to better align with their actual geographic locations on the India map, making the spatial arrangement more recognizable and accurate
Enhance the visual clarity of the IndiaMap component by increasing card sizes, improving text readability, adding stronger borders or outlines, and ensuring hover states provide clear visual feedback
Update the website name from the current name to 'SahityaAurShabd' in all visible locations including the header logo, page titles, and any branding elements
Add a colored map of India as a background image behind the clickable state/UT cards in the IndiaMap component, ensuring the physical map outline aligns spatially with the interactive card positions
Refine the positioning of clickable state/UT cards in the IndiaMap component to precisely align with their corresponding geographic regions on the background India map
